entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:51 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
